title.rendered: STEDI 2 PACK 20W LED WORK LIGHT SLIM BLACK

content.rendered:
New to our range is the STEDI 20w LED Work Lights sold in a set of 2 following the same aesthetics and LEDs of everyone’s favourite, the 10w Mini. Applicable across the board as a work light on your vehicle or as some additional flood lights to add at the front of your motorcycle to give you higher viability around the shoulders of the road.

PACKAGED PERFORMANCE.

Created from the platform of our infamous 10w Mini LED Work lights comes our 20w alteration. We doubled the 5w Osram LEDs in each unit bringing a stronger beam throw and a wider flood.

LOW POWER, HIGH BRIGHTNESS. 

With a low amperage of just 0.9a per unit, most find themselves quite surprised at the performance that such a small unit provides. Similar characteristics as our all-time favourite 10w mini with a more intense illumination which has no shortage of usefulness.

APPLICATION

Our 20w LED Work Lights have endless application whether you need them to give good visibility around the job site or lighting up the camping grounds, they will hold up to the task.

DETAILS

STEDI ST1012-20W Work Lights are one of the most versatile work lights in our range.  The low profile, low current draw, an smooth flood beam make this the ideal camp light, reverse light or work light.

Drawing only 0.9A each, our Slim Flood Lights manage to produce a perfect 1200 Lumens which is a testament to quality Osram LEDs in these units.

 

 

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS

LED POWER 20 WATTS
OPERATING VOLTAGE 9-32v
LED CHIPS 4 x Osram LED
COLOUR TEMPERATURE 5700K
TESTED LUMENS 1,200Lm (each)
CURRENT DRAW 0.9A @ 13.5v (each)
BEAM Flood Beam (45 degree)
IP RATING IP67
DUSTPROOF & ANTI-VIBRATION YES
LENS PMMA LENS
MOUNTING BRACKET 3 Series Stainless
HOUSING MATERIAL DIE CAST ALLOY
LIFE SPAN 50,000+ HOURS
WEIGHT 0.445kg (each)

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x 20w LED WORK LIGHT
  • Comprehensive Fasteners Kit
  • Male & Female Deutsch Connectors

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI 2 PACK 20W LED WORK LIGHT SLIM BLACK

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
